sentences: Kahe riigi vahel loodi normaalsed suhted.
context: In Estonian, 'normaalne' is an adjective that means normal or regular. It can refer to things being within standard parameters (like normal blood pressure or body temperature), natural or usual in nature, or psychologically healthy/sane. The word follows the standard Estonian declension pattern with forms like normaalse (genitive), normaalset (partitive), and formaalsed (plural nominative).
